Body:
request = [(self.zipcode, self.day), (self.day, self.zipcode), (self.lat,
    self.lon, self.day), (self.day, self.lat, self.lon), (self.lat, self.
    day, self.lon)]
request = wthr.verify_request(request)
self.assertTrue(isinstance(request, list))
self.assertTrue(all(isinstance(i, wthr.WeatherRequest) for i in request))
self.assertTrue(all(i.lat == self.lat and i.lon == self.lon and i.zipcode ==
    self.zipcode for i in request))
